Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly unparalleled in its value and significance. This product, which I believe holds immense worth to you at $1,200,000, has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. I understand its importance to you and am eager to facilitate this transaction.

To make this acquisition possible, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This represents a significant saving for you while still allowing me to achieve my goal of maximizing the value of the product. I am confident that this offer will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing you with exceptional value and satisfaction.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to ensure a smooth and seamless transaction. I look forward to the possibility of working together to bring this remarkable product into your possession.

Warm regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,150,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,150,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
